name: Chicago Manual of Style parchment background
description: Chicago Manual of Style Online with a nice parchment color instead of white for the background -- easier on the eyes.

user.name: RobertJSawyer
user.about: Hugo and Nebula Award-winning science-fiction novelist. Author of 23 novels including FlashForward, basis for the ABC TV series.

additional_info:
This style simply replaces every occurrence of "background-color: white" with "background-color: #F1E9D2", which is a nice parchment shade.  If you prefer a different background color, change all occurrences of #F1E9D2 to whatever you wish.


Note: This style sheet is in Firefox/Mozillla format. To use it with the Chrome browser, delete '@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org") {' and the final '}' at the end.
